item.title: Canopy | Canopy is Joining CNN!
item.description: Today we’re very happy to announce that we are joining CNN! This acquisition takes the big dream of Canopy and makes it much bigger.

item.title: Canopy | How Tonic is Experimenting With Reader Vibes
item.description: Vibes are what Tonic thinks you’re giving off based on your reading history, likes and dislikes.

item.title: Canopy | Canopy's Annika Goldman at Code Media
item.description: Watch Canopy's COO Annika Goldman at Code Media 2019

item.title: Canopy | Tonic Rolls Out New Control Features...and Dark Mode!
item.description: Tonic, the app that gives you a personalized selection of reads every day, has been updated to give you more control.

item.title: Canopy | Canopy Staff Picks!
item.description: We have found that the experience of discovering a selection of articles from a diverse set of voices and publications every day has been, well, delightful.

item.title: Canopy | Why is big tech pivoting on privacy?
item.description: We have been surprised to see the rest of the tech world starting to wake up to privacy and data security issues.

item.title: Canopy | Welcome to Canopy!
item.description: Today I am introducing Canopy, a new company focused on giving you a new way to explore the world—without ever revealing your personal data.

item.title: Canopy | Let's fix the internet together
item.description: What if you could have an amazing, personalized experience without being manipulated or deceived into giving up more and more of yourself?

item.title: Canopy | Bassey Etim and Matthew Ogle Join Canopy
item.description: We are excited to announce our new Head of Product and Editorial Director.

item.title: Canopy | Should we model ethics?
item.description: FAT* is about fairness, accountability, and transparency in computer systems, there were moments at the conference that made me, as a woman in computer science, feel like the president of the Hair Club For Men;

item.title: Canopy | Fighting (for) the future
item.description: If I believe there is a way to build an online infrastructure that is profitable, yet declines to package our most private thoughts into commodities to be bought and sold on the open market, then I should get involved.

item.title: Canopy | A few of our favorite things
item.description: We wanted to share a few of our favorite articles and podcasts that we’ve recommended to our testers.

item.title: Canopy | A better way to discover things
item.description: At Canopy, we believe strongly that learning about content is more important than trying to amplify engagement. Many of us had built massively scaled recommendation, ad tech or analytics systems in past lives, and we all knew there were a few things we wished we could have accomplished.

item.title: Canopy | Amie Green and Gabriel Valdivia join Canopy
item.description: Today we are excited to announce our new Head of Marketing and Head of Design.

item.title: Canopy | A few of Bassey's favorite things
item.description: Here’s some of the best stuff we’ve recommended in the past month and my methodically constructed, deeply essential notes on each.‍

item.title: Canopy | Incomplete Information: A "Gamey" Discussion
item.description: Pocket aces, article reading histories, and thunderstorms before a flight - what do they all have in common? None of them tell the complete story.

item.title: Canopy | Introducing Tonic!
item.description: Today we are incredibly excited to announce the arrival of Tonic - a new discovery app that gives you a personalized selection of reads every day.

item.title: Canopy | Building off gratitude
item.description: As my fellow CANOpeers and I signed off for the Thanksgiving weekend, we all posted messages on Slack about what we are thankful for this holiday season.

item.title: Canopy | Canopy goes to FAT*
item.description: Last week, a group of us from Canopy traveled to Atlanta to attend FAT*, a multi-disciplinary conference on fairness, accountability and transparency in socio-technical systems.

item.title: Canopy | How we review code at Canopy
item.description: Over a year ago, we sat down at various Central Square establishments to talk about all the ways people screw up engineering culture and how we were going to get it right this time

item.title: Canopy | Curious about our beta? Watch this video.
item.description: Our first app helps you find the best parts of the internet, without scrolling through endless feeds, or losing control of your data, or being tracked across the web.We made a video to explain how it all works.

item.title: Canopy | How we think about strategy at Canopy
item.description: Silicon Valley has long relied on a mentality that they create (and own) the tools, that those tools are value neutral, and that progress is inevitable. But as we’ve seen the past couple of years, the future is unwritten.
